TopicTitle: Mod to permanently change orbit of planets?

Articles.Content:
Hey,

Just wondering if theres a mod that allows you to permanently edit the orbits of planets. I know hyperedit lets you edit orbits, but as far as I can tell there isnt a way to permanently save the changes. When I restart the game, the orbits are reset.
There's RealSolarSystem (You can modify the CFG to do other stuff), but you have to know how to modify it's cfg. (It uses this code)

This should not be here in the addon releases thread

yup there is RSS.. I think korporous does it too..

Edited February 8, 2015 by Joshwoo69

I've also edited the thread title for clarity; in the future, please use descriptive titles that summarize the issue at hand, instead of the overly-generic "Need help" or "Question about a mod".

Maybe I'm recalling incorrectly but I think you can do that with Hyper Edit. Although, I'm not sure you would want to seeing as there are many undesirable possible outcomes from fooling around with Hyper Edit.
I don't think HyperEdit's changes are permanent, but I might be misrecalling.
